p.s: In the first shot of the sequence Chris is walking down the school hallway.
The director of the movie uses a long shot to show Chris and his surroundings.
You can see how he greets other people with a smile or a handshake, wichwhich means that he is probably popular in school.
The shot is filmed from StarrsStarr's perspective and in slow motion with romantic, slow music playing in the background, wichwhich shows her love and adoration for Chris.
This gets increased in the second shot.
Chris is shown in a medium close up, so you can see his facial expressions, in this case a smile.
Starr also describes the things that she loves about him, like his smell or his lips, wichwhich are both very intimate things.
In the next shot Chris sees Starr standing at her locker and the background music stops.
Starr turns away from him and a big close up is used, so you can see StarrsStarr's facial expressions very good.
The camera is positioned in her locker.

Her facial expressions change from ignorant to a small smile and then back to ignorant when Chris shows her the mixtape, wichwhich shows that she likes the tape and the gesture but does not want Chris to see it because she is still mad at him.
Chris probably made the mixtape as some kind of apology to Starr.
When they start to talk, Starr is shown in a close up and Chris in a medium shot, wichwhich shows his surroundings and the hallway with students walking by.

His body language is shown when Chris starts to explain, that he just wants to be closer to Starr and that she is very important to him, he is no longer shown in a medium shot, but in a medium close up, wichwhich shows his facial expressions and feelings and that he means everything he says.
The last shot shows Chris dancing in the school hallway to his mixtape.
When Starr says that he makes her laugh, his dance is shown in a medium shot and also in slow motion so you can see his movements very good.
All in all Chris is portrayed as a popular guy, who you can have very much fun with and who does not care what people could think about him, but who can be serious in important situations.
